findings.title: Country Names in Language Selector Are Not Translated
findings.description: In the country/language selector dropdown, country names appear in English instead of Hebrew
reproductionSteps: 2. Click on the country selector dropdown in the header
findings.expectedBehavior: Country names should be displayed in Hebrew (ישראל, רוסיה, ארצות הברית)
findings.actualBehavior: Country names are displayed in English (Israel, Russia, United States)
findings.impact: Users see mixed languages in interface, reduces localization quality

findings.title: Phone Country Code Dropdown Shows English Country Names
findings.description: In phone number input modals, country names in the country code dropdown are in English
reproductionSteps: 1. Navigate to mortgage or credit calculator
2. Click 'Next' to trigger phone verification modal
findings.expectedBehavior: Country names should be in Hebrew
findings.impact: Inconsistent language experience in critical user flows

findings.title: Missing Translation Keys in Various Locations
findings.description: Several UI elements show translation keys instead of Hebrew text
findings.expectedBehavior: All text should be in Hebrew

findings.title: Placeholder Text May Need Review
findings.description: Some placeholder texts could be improved for clarity
reproductionSteps: 1. Navigate to mortgage or credit calculators
2. Review placeholder text in dropdown fields
findings.expectedBehavior: Clear, helpful placeholder text in Hebrew
findings.actualBehavior: Placeholders are functional but could be more descriptive
findings.impact: Minor usability impact, fields are functional

findings.title: Modal Dialogs Hard to Close on Mobile
findings.description: Login/phone verification modals appear automatically and are difficult to dismiss on mobile
reproductionSteps: 2. Click hamburger menu or trigger modal
findings.expectedBehavior: Modals should be easily dismissible with clear close buttons
findings.actualBehavior: Modals overlay content and close button may be hard to access
findings.impact: Poor mobile user experience, potential user frustration

findings.title: Mobile Menu Navigation Needs Testing
findings.description: Mobile hamburger menu functionality requires verification
findings.expectedBehavior: Menu should expand with all navigation options
findings.actualBehavior: Menu triggers but navigation flow needs verification

findings.title: Step Indicator Text Truncation on Mobile
findings.description: Progress step labels are shortened on mobile (e.g., 'פרטים' instead of 'פרטים אישיים')
reproductionSteps: 1. Navigate to mortgage or credit calculator
findings.expectedBehavior: Clear step labels even if abbreviated
findings.impact: Minor usability issue, still understandable in context
